argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lduallvec.d | |- D = ( LDual ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lduallvec.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) |
| 3 |  | #P_lveclmod | |- ( W e. LVec -> W e. LMod ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_lduallmod | |- ( ph -> D e. LMod ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppR ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) = ( oppR ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` D ) = ( Scalar ` D ) |
| 9 | 6, 7, 1, 8, 2 | #P_ldualsca | |- ( ph -> ( Scalar ` D ) = ( oppR ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) ) |
| 10 | 6 | #P_lvecdrng | |- ( W e. LVec -> ( Scalar ` W ) e. DivRing ) |
| 11 | 2, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( Scalar ` W ) e. DivRing ) |
| 12 | 7 | #P_opprdrng | |- ( ( Scalar ` W ) e. DivRing <-> ( oppR ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) e. DivRing ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> ( oppR ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) e. DivRing ) |
| 14 | 9, 13 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ph -> ( Scalar ` D ) e. DivRing ) |
| 15 | 8 | #P_islvec | |- ( D e. LVec <-> ( D e. LMod /\ ( Scalar ` D ) e. DivRing ) ) |
| 16 | 5, 14, 15 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> D e. LVec ) |
